investmeme_bot_textarea_faq_a1: In the crypto market, buying earning projects in the early stages is the key. Smart money (the funds used to buy these projects in the early stages) becomes a guiding indicator in the market. Based on key indicators such as ROI and win rate, Meme Coin Hunter helps you pick out those outstanding “Smart money” addresses, track their flows using its smart routing algorithm, and show you the earning projects that these addresses have recently invested in.
investmeme_bot_textarea_faq_a2: By filtering massive information, Meme Coin Hunter can identify trading data that draws your attention. It’s not always accurate to predict market fluctuation, but Meme Coin Hunter can help you make better investment decisions.
investmeme_bot_textarea_faq_a3:
Meme Coin Hunter can send out trading signals like recommending you to buy or sell earning projects. Before using such signals to trade, you need to take several key elements into account, including market conditions, the token’s basics, and crypto distribution.
Given the complexity and unpredictability of the market, we strongly suggest you use these signals wisely. You can also control trading risks using some trading approaches, such as setting TP/SL, using safe and high-liquidity trading tools provided by third parties, etc.
investmeme_bot_textarea_faq_a4:
Meme Coin Hunter is devoted to providing accurate market analysis information. It doesn’t provide investment advice. We suggest you make your investment decisions based on your own research and judgment.
Also, Meme Coin Hunter is currently in the primary development stage. We’ll continuously adjust and optimize our services by taking serious consideration on your and market feedback.

invest_bonus_pay_rewards_faq_answer_6: It’s currently {percent} APY, but is subject to change at any time.
invest_bonus_pay_rewards_faq_answer_5:
You can pause your rewards at any time, and they’ll stop accruing right away.


To opt out:

  1. Go to Rewards in OKX Pay.
  2. Tap the settings icon in the top right corner.
  3. Select None and tap OK.


The rewards that have previously accrued or have been distributed to your account do not expire.
invest_loan_placeorder_tooltip_borrow_fe: Charged when you get a loan
invest_bonus_pay_rewards_faq_answer_4:
Eligible customers accrue daily rewards based on their eligible Pay balance and the rewards rate. Any pending rewards will show the day after accrual.


OKX distributes rewards monthly, by the fifth business day of the following month, directly to your {cryptoOne} balance.


For example:
You hold 1,000 {cryptoTwo} for 15 days, and then 500 {cryptoTwo} for another 15 days, then you will be paid 3.69 {cryptoOne} in rewards early the following month.


You can use your balance at any time, and you will still receive all accrued rewards.
invest_bonus_pay_rewards_faq_answer_3:
It’s simple, all you have to do is:

  1. Activate OKX Pay and verify your identity.
  2. Add {cryptoOne} or {cryptoTwo} on {network} in OKX Pay.
  3. Earn rewards just by holding those stablecoins.
invest_bonus_pay_rewards_faq_answer_2: To be eligible, you must be verified, have active accounts, and hold between {amountMin} and {amountCap} {cryptoOne} or {cryptoTwo} in OKX Pay on {network}.
invest_bonus_pay_rewards_faq_answer_1:
This is a loyalty program that allows eligible customers to earn rewards on {cryptoOne} or {cryptoTwo} in OKX Pay on {network}. The program is funded by OKX and is designed to incentivize holding stablecoins in OKX Pay. Your assets remain in your Pay balance and in your full control.


We reserve the right to change or discontinue the rewards at any time.


Please refer to the Terms of Service for further details.

investredeem_mid_tooltip_slippage_tolera:
Slippage refers to the difference between the expected trading price and the execution price. Your transaction will be canceled if the price changes unfavorably by more than your slippage setting.
Auto-setting slippage helps increase the chance of a successful transaction, but it may not be a favorable deal. When price impact is high, the slippage percentage will automatically increase.
Setting a high slippage tolerance can help transactions succeed, but you might not get a good price. Use with caution.

investdetails_mid_pop_terms_content:
By using this third-party platform, your use of and any information you provide to the third-party platform will be governed by their terms.

OKX Wallet and its affiliates are not in any way associated with the third-party platform, makes no warranties, representations or undertakings relating to the third-party platform’s content, goods and services, and are not responsible or liable for any loss, damage and any other consequences arising directly or indirectly from your use of the third-party platform.

Please conduct your own due diligence before investing in any third-party platforms to avoid asset loss.

invest_bonus_desc_bttmsheet_terms:
1. The Annualized Percentage Yield (APY) is provided by a third party platform (“Third Party”). Actual APYs, rewards, bonuses, and/or other terms of service may vary at the discretion of the Third Party and/or due to market changes.

2. The information provided is not a financial advice. OKX and its affiliates are not in any way associated with the Third Party aggregated on OKX. OKX does not endorse, approve, or make warranties, representations or undertakings related to the content, goods and services of the Third Party. OKX is not responsible or liable for any losses, damages, and/or consequences arising directly or indirectly from my use of these services. In the event of any losses or damages, including but not limited to the loss of my digital assets, I should to seek resolution directly from the Third Parties.

3. By using this service, I agree that I have made an independent assessment and accept the risks associated with staking my digital assets with the Third Party. I am responsible for my actions, and OKX assumes no responsibility for any outcomes related to my choices.
